diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,53 @@
+#pragma once
+
+#include "torch/csrc/WindowsTorchApiMacro.h"
+#include "torch/csrc/jit/assertions.h"
+#include "torch/csrc/jit/fuser/tensor_desc.h"
+
+#include <memory>
+#include <cstdint>
+#include <vector>
+
+namespace torch { namespace jit { namespace fuser {
+
+// Descriptor for chunk-ing an input tensor into subtensors
+// OR concat-ing an output tensor from subtensors
+struct TORCH_API PartitionDesc {
+  PartitionDesc()
body: Hmmm is this default constructor really needed? I thought `PartitionDesc`s are simply wrappers around `TensorDesc`s that also add the number of subtensors, but this doesn't seem true if this constructor is present.
body_html: Hmmm is this default constructor really needed? I thought PartitionDescs are simply wrappers around TensorDescs that also add the number of subtensors, but this doesn't seem true if this constructor is present.
